creatures.name: Rockjaw
creatures.description: This creature loves to burrow and tunnel into the earth to eat precious ores with it's large rock-like jaws.

skills.name: Jaw Bash
skills.effect: User smashes their jaw into their target with enough force to shatter bone. May lower target's speed.

skills.name: Burrow
skills.effect: User tunnels into the ground and jumps out of the tunnel, crashing into the opponent.

creatures.name: Smogbra
creatures.description: This creature silently sneaks up on prey and sprays toxic fumes into their face, incapacitating them.

skills.name: Toxic Fumes
skills.effect: User sprays a toxic gas at their oponent, poisoning them.

skills.name: Static Bite
skills.effect: The target is bitten and has venom injected into their body that paralyzes them.
